test_instructions: Navigate to the page and verify it loads successfully
expected_result: Page should load with HTTP status 200 and display the Azure DevOps Test Plans overview content within 3 seconds

test_instructions: Click on the 'Get started' link in the main content area
expected_result: Should navigate to a getting started guide page and load within 2 seconds

test_instructions: Verify the left navigation menu is present and contains test-related topics
expected_result: Left navigation should be visible and contain sections like 'Test Plans', 'Manual testing', 'Exploratory testing'

test_instructions: Check page responsiveness by resizing browser window to mobile size (375px width)
expected_result: Page should adapt to mobile layout with collapsible navigation and readable text without horizontal scrolling

test_instructions: Search for 'test plans' using the search functionality
expected_result: Search should return relevant results related to Azure DevOps Test Plans within 2 seconds

test_instructions: Verify all images on the page load correctly
expected_result: All images should load without broken image icons and have appropriate alt text

test_instructions: Test page scroll performance by scrolling to the bottom
expected_result: Page should scroll smoothly without lag and load any lazy-loaded content within 1 second

test_instructions: Click on the breadcrumb navigation to go back to parent section
expected_result: Should navigate to the parent Azure DevOps documentation section and load within 2 seconds

test_instructions: Verify the 'In this article' table of contents on the right side
expected_result: Should display clickable section links that jump to corresponding sections when clicked

test_instructions: Test keyboard navigation using Tab key to navigate through all interactive elements
expected_result: All buttons, links, and form elements should be reachable and have visible focus indicators
